snippet: Municipalities and institutions should leave the decision about whether to eat at Chick-fil-A to individual consumers and not to officeholders.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Steve Salbu, Scheller College of Business dean, states Chick-fil-A's harsh stance against same-sex marriage deeply troubles him and other members of the gay community but expresses dismay at municipal leaders trying to banish the business from their cities; holds if elected officials run Chick-fil-A out of town, they are effectively voting for everyone and eliminating individual freedoms.
lead_paragraph: Municipalities and institutions should leave the decision about whether to eat at Chick-fil-A to individual consumers and not to officeholders.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
